channel.title: Admin.or mod who can tell a admin or maker about this. plz
channel.description:
i posted my friends server on server statu page and now i try posting my own server says you can only post one server ,srry plz can you fix this so i can post my server on server statu page
suggestion:make is so people can only post one server everyday not post only one server for ever
